      public char[][] insertCardInMatrix(char[][] matrix, Card card, int x, int y, Boolean side) throws IllegalCommandException
      This method inserts a card in a matrix of characters.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the matrix of characters
      card - the card to insert
      x - the x coordinate of the card
      y - the y coordinate of the card
      side - the side of the card
      Returns:
      the matrix with the card inserted
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException
